description:
The Vongola hideout and Tsuna have lost contact with each other. Futa and the others are concerned for Tsuna`s safety, but they cannot help him from the hideout. Meanwhile, Irie has figured out how many of Tsuna`s friends have snuck into his hideout. He places his chosen team at facilities suitable to intercept them. But White Spell Vyshana attacks Black Spell Nigella, who was placed in the same block as him! The Gokudera and the others appear on the scene, they see something shocking…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 漢(おとこ)の匣(ボックス)兵器
